question: Which among the following books written by Shams i Siraj Afif?
explanation: Tarikh-i-Firoz Shahi (or the history of Sultan Firoj Shah Tughlaq) was written by Shams i Siraj Afif .The most accurate and  authentic contemporary account of Sultan Firoz Shah Tughlaq period is solely denoted in it and the book also describes the life  and conditions of the people at large.
